page.title: 03Farm Study : Part One
page.content:
Vane Road Primary School : Class 6 **********************************
The farm we visited is called Carrsides Farm. The farm is owned by Mr. and Mrs. Wilkinson. They live in the farmhouse with their two sons, one daughter and a nanny. Four people work on the farm but more people help when they are busy. The farm covers 300 acres. There are eight large fields. The fields are used for cows and crops. It is a big farm with lots of buildings animals and machines. The farm was on the Eden Estate and has been there for over 300 years. There is a combine harvester, a tractor and silage machinery. They grow grass, wheat, barley and oilseed rape. There are 80 cows with their calves, 500 hens and 12 sheep. The farmer marks his cows with a brand mark or an ear clip.
